scripts.build:docs: pip install mkdocs-material mkdocs-awesome-pages-plugin mkdocs-macros-plugin mkdocs-git-revision-date-localized-plugin mkdocs-minify-plugin && python -m mkdocs build -f mkdocs.yml
scripts.build:web: cd web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:docs && npm run build:web
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p dist && cp -r web/out/* dist/ && mkdir -p dist/docs && cp -r site/* dist/docs/
